revised_title: Effects of Pregnant Mares Serum and Horse Pituitary Extract on Bovine Ovary
tldr: The authors studied the response of the bovine ovary to pregnant mares' serum and horse pituitary extract. They found that these gonadotrophic preparations stimulated follicle growth and ovulation in the bovine ovary. The study provides insights into the effects of these treatments on the bovine ovary and their potential use in clinical applications.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Reproductive Biology
